title: Complete the Model Registry Workflow
description: Fill in the blanks to register a trained model to the MLflow Model Registry, then transition it to production.
hints: register_model() takes the run URI and a name
MlflowClient is used for model management operations
transition_model_version_stage() moves a model between stages
explanation: The MLflow Model Registry provides a central hub for model versioning and stage transitions. Models move through stages: None → Staging → Production → Archived. This workflow enables controlled model deployment.
